mapper.insert: insert into t_crawler_task (crawlerId, url, host, isDownload, statusCode, retryCount, lastModified, httpMethod, params, execDate) values (#{crawlerId},#{url},#{host},#{isDownload},#{statusCode},#{retryCount},#{lastModified},#{httpMethod},#{params},#{execDate});
mapper.select: select * from t_crawler_task where url=#{url} order by execDate
select * from t_crawler_task where url=#{url} order by execDate for update
select count(url) from t_crawler_task where url=#{url} and statusCode=200 and isDownload=false
select * from t_crawler_task where statusCode != 200 and isDownload=false order by execDate limit 1
select retryCount from t_crawler_task where url=#{url} order by execDate
select * from t_crawler_task where and isDownload=false and statusCode =200 order by execDate limit 1 for update
mapper.update:
update t_crawler_task
host = #{host},
isDownload = #{isDownload},
statusCode = #{statusCode},
retryCount = #{retryCount},
lastModified = #{lastModified},
httpMethod = #{httpMethod},
params = #{params},
execDate = #{execDate}
where url = #{url};
